Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.utils

Class ExprUtils

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.core.utils.ExprUtils
public final class ExprUtils extends Object
Utility functions related to expressions.

      public static <ExprType extends Type> Expr<ExprType> reverse(Expr<ExprType> expr, VarIndexing indexing)

      Returns:
